messages.title: It’s a two horse race
messages.content: The race in Park Ward is between the Lib Dems and Gordon Brown’s Labour candidate.

messages.title: Help Nick Clegg's Lib Dems change Britain today
messages.content: Make a donation to help the Lib Dems rise and keep the Labour out.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrat tax plan will mean that no one will pay tax on the first £10,000 they earn. Millions of low earners will pay no tax at all. Those earning over £100,000 will pay £17 a week more.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Improving the services we all rely on
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats plan to protect vital public services and eliminate £700 in waste in the NHS that can be spent on frontline services.

Every child deserves a quality education and a clean environment to grow up in. The Liberal Democrats will invest in our schools to cut class sizes, abolish university tuition fees and take real action on climate change.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The race in Park Ward is positioned as a two-horse race between the Lib Dems and Labour, implying strategic voting to keep Labour out.

issues.education: Investing in our future: The Liberal Democrats will invest in our schools to cut class sizes.
issues.environment: Investing in our future: Take real action on climate change.
issues.health: Improving the services we all rely on: Eliminate £700 million of waste in the NHS that can be spent on frontline services.

contactInformation.address: Freepost RSWZ - LEZT - GXCK, Wolverhampton Liberal Democrats, 3 Merridale Lane, Wolverhampton WV3 9QY

endorsements.endorsement: I am working closely with Jonathan Webber and Claire Darke to get a better deal for Park Ward residents.

quotes.text: They work all year round and not just at election time.

images.caption: Liberal Democrat local election candidate Jonathan Webber (left) and Parliamentary candidate Robin Lawrence are delighted with this newly resurfaced road.
